fragment.para: The format of the archive file on the source port:

listitem.para: If its value is zip, the step expects a ZIP archive on the source port.
If absent or the empty sequence, the step tries to guess the archive file format. The only format that this step is required to recognize and handle is ZIP.
Whether any other archive formats can be handled and what their names (values for this option) are depends on the XProc processor used.
